name: Become
description:
Become is a puzzle game about transforming into your enemies. There is a variety of enemies spanning 2 areas, each with their own unique abilities that allow for interesting puzzles.

Controls:
WASD: Move
1-2: Use Revive Potions
R: Restart current level
Space: Show/Hide Help
Escape: Exit Level

All assets other than the music were created by me for this project.

Music:

Brittle Rille by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3460-brittle-rille
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

I began working on this project in December 2019, but stopped production around March 2020 without finishing the game or releasing any demos. In September 2021 I found the original files for the project and decided to complete the second area that was never finished and polish many parts of the game, along with releasing it here. There are still many assets that were created for areas 3 and 4 that I could implement in a later release if there is any interest.
